metadata.description: UPSC Student Archetypes for personalized study planning

archetypes.name: The Full-Time Professional
archetypes.description: For students who can dedicate a full-time schedule to their studies.

archetypes.name: The Working Professional
archetypes.description: For students who are balancing their studies with a full-time job.

archetypes.name: The Specialist
archetypes.description: For students who want to focus on strengthening their weak areas first.

archetypes.name: The Generalist
archetypes.description: For students who want to build on their strengths first.
